Text: in case you didnt noticepst Louise Office Depot has the Epson Stylus EPX Photo Printer for USD and with the purchase they are including sheet packs of Epson Heavyweight Matte paper The coupon was in yesterdays Houston Chronicle Have a Great Week Its Summer time in Texas yee haw hot Best Regards Bobbi work space EB b fax

immigration deferred comp question tax preparerpst Louise Marcus Immigrate Visas The attorneys have advised that the Approval Notice has still not been received Deferred Comp Tim Callahan has a meeting with PricewaterhouseCoopers today regarding deferred comp You will be advised as soon as I have results of their meeting Richard Frank I understand Rick has touched base with you regarding the tax preparation issue for employing Scotts nanny Please let me know if you need anything else from me and if everything is going okay Nanny I contacted the nannys former employer twice on Tuesday July I didnt want to leave a message on the answering machine Therefore I will try again this evening Scott Birth Certificates obtained today Information to you regarding US passport in process Cheers Welcome Summer Best Regards Bobbi mailstop EB b fax

nanny packet taxes criminal checkpst Louise and Marcus I hope you were all including extended family members safe and sound during the recent storms and that there was no damage to your home your belongings or your family traveling to and from the airport Criminal Check As fate would have it instead of going by the county clerks office on Friday when I left I decided to go on Monday morning Due to the storms they are still inoperable I will continue to followup and will definitely be one of the first in line when they open Packet I have received no packets As you recall I ordered two last week I have left voice mails today and yesterday with no response They could be flooded as well I will continue to try to ascertain the status of the information packet Taxes I spoke with Richard Frank CPA and will provide him all of our pertinent email information regarding the nanny and tax issues Once he reviews it he will contact Marcus andor myself regarding outstanding questions Misc I am hand delivering the I form SS form and the information I obtained from Enron Life Worksthe new enron kids center to Marcus today Welcome Summer Best Regards Bobbi mailstop EB b fax

nanny packet Cc Eureka I ordered the nanny packet I finally spoke with a live body who seemed knowledgeable and helpful In order to avoid confusion I had it sent to my home address and will expedite it to you upon receipt which should be five days Welcome Summer Best Regards Bobbi mailstop EB b fax

RE certified original birth certificate Uk birth registry passportpst Miss Louise Welcome to being a parent It only gets better How are you doing I will respond with proper information later However you really havent said if you are doing well Did everything go okay Please call if you have a moment to visit My cell number is and home is Do you have family visiting to help you When you are ready to share Scott please feel free to let me know and we can have yall over to our house for dinner This may prove a good break from your usual routine if you like Welcome Summer Best Regards Bobbi mailstop EB b fax Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Tuesday June PM To Tessandori Bobbi Subject Re certified original birth certificate Uk birth registry passport Ignore previous email I obviously have lost the power to see the bottom of the screen where your number is fax on its way Bobbi NRON PM To Louise Kitchen cc marcus Nettelton Subject certified original birth certificate Uk birth registry passport Louise Birth registry with The Vital Statistics and Records office the office who issues certified original birth certificates will not have record of Scotts birth for approximately eight weeks We need this document to obtain the UK birth registry and passport If you have plans to travel soonbefore the birth certificate is available we can appear in person with tickets travel itineraries are not acceptable information provided by the hospital and obtain it by pm the day following the application I will also need the two items listed in the next paragraph as well If you have no immediate travel plans I have calendared the seventh week after Scotts birth to obtain documentation from you a letter with your signature stating I can receive it on your behalf and a copy of your drivers license I will then confirm his birth has been registered and apply on your behalf Best Regards Bobbi new telephone new fax new address Smith St mailstop EB Houston TX physical location EBb Embedded Picture Device Independent Bitmap

followuppst Louise I sent two emails to you last Friday May I have a concern that perhaps you have not received them Can you confirm receipt please Thanks Best Regards Bobbi new telephone new fax new address Smith St mailstop EB Houston TX physical location EBb

certified original birth certificate Uk birth registry passport Cc Louise Birth registry with The Vital Statistics and Records office the office who issues certified original birth certificates will not have record of Scotts birth for approximately eight weeks We need this document to obtain the UK birth registry and passport If you have plans to travel soonbefore the birth certificate is available we can appear in person with tickets travel itineraries are not acceptable information provided by the hospital and obtain it by pm the day following the application I will also need the two items listed in the next paragraph as well If you have no immediate travel plans I have calendared the seventh week after Scotts birth to obtain documentation from you a letter with your signature stating I can receive it on your behalf and a copy of your drivers license I will then confirm his birth has been registered and apply on your behalf Best Regards Bobbi new telephone new fax new address Smith St mailstop EB Houston TX physical location EBb

RE green card processpst Louise I cant tell you how excited I am to do it I also get the great pleasure of saying who I am working on it for along with working for you at work It is taking a long time as we bought a travel trailer and have been working on getting it ready for the deer lease Ive decided like that authority when its finally complete thats when well have yall over for dinner and present it to you then Tell me who your framer is as I will have more items to frame down the road P S I showed you my sons Christmas stocking it took me a year to complete it and I was traveling a lot and used many flights as stitching time Thanks again for being I am very excited for you Best Regards Bobbi International Human Resources telephone work space EB b fax Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Thursday October PM To Tessandori Bobbi Nettelton Marcus Subject RE green card process Thanks Wow still on blue we all meMarcus and Scott appreciate the work Louise Original Message From Tessandori Bobbi Sent Thursday October PM To Kitchen Louise Nettelton Marcus Subject green card process Louise and Marcus I received confirmation from Tindall Foster today that there is no new news to report at this time Louise Congratulations One of the Most Powerful Women in Business What a complement to you and to women as a whole Thank you for the great inspiration to all the young women and girls I am proud to work for you P S Almost done with the blue Best Regards Bobbi International Human Resources telephone work space EB b fax

Green CardPermanent Resident Alien Statuspst Marcus and Louise Nothing new to report regarding your green cards still in wait mode Marcus It was a pleasure to see you yesterday Louise Do you have a moment this morning I have a quick item I need your opinion regarding Best Regards Bobbi International Human Resources telephone work space EB b fax

Tindall Foster Cc Michelle May I have a copy of the agreement between Tindall Foster and Enron as it pertains to the US immigration process Or perhaps you can advise if there is a clause stating that we must utilize them exclusively and if so what is the effective date A cloudy day is no match for a sunny dispositionWA Ward Best Regards Bobbi International Human Resources tel fax work space EB b email

FW Breaking Immigration News State Department Visa Appointments in Canada and MexicoWARNING Cc FYI Please see below Everything comes to those who hustle while he waits Thomas Edison Best Regards Bobbi International Human Resources tel fax work space EB b email The Department of State has advised that it is temporarily Suspending the online nonimmigrant visa appointment system and the number appointments for third country national TCN processing at border posts as of It appears that the suspension is across the board for all nationalities at the moment Notifying those with appointments to postpone their trip until the impact of the applicants departure from the US is confirmed with the INS This action is the State Departments response to concerns that applicants at border posts have no way of knowing if CFR d will still be applied to the supposed list of countries whose nationals are subject to additional clearances as reported in the press last week but treated as classified information by DOS Please note that more than the countries reported may be involved According to DOS the Visa Office will contact the INS today to follow up on the impact of the policy on applications for reentry into the US after a visa application at a border post AILA is advocating that at least normal procedures apply Normal procedures would involve two trips to the consulate the first resulting in a g denial while clearance is pending Then the applicant if eligible could return to the US under CFR d Once the clearance is completed the applicant would then return to the consulate At the moment it is unclear whether this existing policy will apply and we have been warned that it may not In light of this uncertainty care must be taken that applicants are not stranded in Mexico or Canada The DOS Visa Office also advises that it is increasing staff for revalidation of visas due to the increasing workload caused by this policy change and by the holidays

RE Immigration forms and restatement of earningsLadies I failed to mention that we have paperwork pending signature waiting on a response If a quick response of continue as is for now works for me Everything comes to those who hustle while he waits Thomas Edison Best Regards Bobbi International Human Resources tel fax work space EB b email Original Message From Tessandori Bobbi Sent Monday November AM To Cash Michelle Cc Palmer Lizzette Subject Immigration forms and restatement of earnings Michelle On the INS forms there are two places which refer to Gross Annual Income billion Net Annual Income million Currently when Tindall Foster are completing the forms they use our annual report to complete these Would you advise if we should revised these with the recent events and include the appropriate statementrestatement with the annual report we submit Or continue utilizing only the annual reports and the figures held within Thank you Everything comes to those who hustle while he waits Thomas Edison Best Regards Bobbi International Human Resources tel fax work space EB b email

FW Question Enron annual report of earningsMichelle and Lizzette Please see response below from Alice Gruber Please confirm advice Everything comes to those who hustle while he waits Thomas Edison Best Regards Bobbi International Human Resources tel fax work space EB b email Original Message From Alice Gruber ENRON Sent Monday November PM To Tessandori Bobbi Charles Foster Subject RE Question Enron annual report of earnings I spoke with Margaret regarding this issue and let her know that I was wondering about that How is it being handled for other issues I think we could continue to use the current annual report but I think that it would be best to amend the INS forms to show whatever the more accurate numbers are Original Message From Tessandori Bobbi mailtoBobbi NRONcom Sent Monday November PM To Alice Gruber Charles Foster Subject Question Enron annual report of earnings Importance High Charles and Alice Please advise your opinion regarding the INS forms there are two places which refer to Gross Annual Income billion Net Annual Income million Should these be revised to reflect our recent adjustments and if so what would you require to attach to the annual report when submitting these to the INS Or should we continue utilizing only the annual reports and the figures held within Thanks Everything comes to those who hustle while he waits Thomas Edison Best Regards
